long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MemeHunt User Guide

1. Install Chrome Extension
First, download and install our Chrome extension from the Chrome Web Store.

2. Login to Memehunt
After installation, a login page will automatically pop up. Sign in with your account to start using Memehunt.

3. Start Your Meme Journey
Visit Twitter (twitter.com or x.com) and refresh the page. You're now ready to start your magical meme journey!
